website_summaries.verdict: Offers comfort and security in a rugged, travel-friendly design.
pros: Sports and attractive design with durable yet breathable mesh
Fits under the seats of most airlines
cons: It's not leakproof, but this can be remedied by using puppy pads to line the bottom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: *Buys the most expensive pet carrier, chooses the cardboard box instead. I want my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier
customer_reviews.text: Just about to get on our second flight with this carrier. It's awesome. I love that the zippers have clips so little paws can't break free. It came with two pads so we can change them when they get dirty. The straps are as comfy as they can be. Nala (6lb cat) loves the visibility and fits with room to spare. I do wish the little pockets had zippers or Velcro so they would feel more secure. I don't feel comfortable storing things in the pockets for more than a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this carrier! I just received it yesterday and my cat has already made himself at home in it and loves to take naps inside! Insertable fleece pads are thin so they don't take up much room but make the carrier comfortable. The exterior of the carrier is actually really cute! It is very well made. Price was great for what I received!
customer_reviews.author: Kati Rath

customer_reviews.title: Pekingese Approved
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10-pound Pekingese dog and she fit perfectly in this carrier. She is a little bit larger than your average toy breed and we probably could have fit two of her in this carrier. It's a great alternative to many of the larger name brand pet carriers. It's a lot more affordable, but it still looks like you spent a bunch of money. I also love that they give you an extra pad for the bottom of the carrier. The last carrier we had didn't have removable pads, so once it got dirty enough, we couldn't just replace it.
customer_reviews.author: SylviaT

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend. I wouldn't use it every day - it ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for my 14 lb terrier! Would recommend. I wouldn't use it every day - it seems better suited for just the airport. Worked well for JetBlue standard economy, and of course worked even better when I upgraded to "even more space."
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: the bag is great, the color is awesome and it is well ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it because it arrived after the guaranteed date and I was going on a trip but once I opened it, the bag is great, the color is awesome and it is well made. My dog is about 12.5lbs and she fit kind of snugged in it, that's also why I didn't kept it after the date I needed it. But the bag is beautiful, I wish they had one size bigger =) because I would have totally kept it even thought I didn't needed it anymore
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carrier, extremely durable, and super easy to slip my cat into. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is that it was advertised for small dogs and cats. My cat being only 8 lbs at her heaviest, seems a little cramped in this carrier. We don't transport her often, so I did not feel the need to return or exchange it. I love the pocket on the side, and the zippers have little locking clips, which is super helpful if your pet is constantly trying to escape.
customer_reviews.author: FormerPAstudent

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Zippers broke in 6 weeks!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not well made. Bought on April 1 now May 17 and already the zippers broken. Of course past the deadline for return! $40 and lasts 6 weeks? Unfortunate as a nice size and thought process but cheaply made. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Forest Barbieri

customer_reviews.title: Am On a Plane With a Cat and The Top Has a Hole
customer_reviews.text: I am so angry, just bought this, put my cat in it, got to the airport, noticed that the top layer of mesh is peeling away from the opening, not trashed by the cat, it is shoddy workmanship, I am now on a flight from JFK to California, with a sub-par carrier and a cat that I am terrified will manage to pull the mesh further away from the side and escape. Thanks Pawfect Pets, nice job there.
customer_reviews.author: E. West

customer_reviews.title: My cat escaped on an airplane
customer_reviews.text: My initial thought was that this carrier was a bit on the small side. Worse than that- My cat escaped from this carrier on a flight and was standing in the middle of the aisle during take-off. A nightmare! Please make a product that has more secure closures and zippers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This carrier has a great look to it - very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This carrier has a great look to it - very stylish! The bottom padding was very soft and sturdy (the extra pad included is not as sturdy). It fit perfectly under the seats on various flights. Cons: It was still far too large for my 4.5 lb chihuahua. The top portion of the carrier was also quite flimsy and was perpetually caving in on the dog. The shoulder strap was not very sturdy and the bag would often flip on its side while in use. This bag could be improved if it had side zipper pockets and privacy screens that could be zipped up.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use, low quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Low quality product. We utilized this carrier for a 2hr flight with a 10lb dog. However, just 20 minutes into the flight our dog managed to tear at a seam where mesh was connected to the canvas and open a hole large enough to jump out of the carrier. Thankfully there is a collar clip inside the carrier so he couldn’t go far. The product is a poorly constructed dog carrier as it cannot handle a small dog (mini dachshund). A refund has been requested, however a pet carrier only being used for 1-way of a vacation is a nuisance since finding an alternative airline pet carrier during vacation was required.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Davis

customer_reviews.title: I’m sorry I purchased this.
customer_reviews.text: This product won’t stand up properly. It arrived flat, which is not a problem in and of itself, but I can’t get the crate to straighten it and hold that shape. And when my puppy had an accident on one of the pads, I threw it in the washer... And the padding inside is all bunched up. What a waste. The only way I will be able to get it flat again as if I cut it open. I’m sorry I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: For a toy dog not a small dog in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. Definitely way to small for a 10 lb dog. We returned ours for one that holds a 25 lb dog for my 8/9 lb multipoo. It fit her much, much better. This is more for a toy dog in my opinion. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Shalene

customer_reviews.title: VERY Small
customer_reviews.text: I got this to take my kitten home in and I returned it when I saw how small it was. The side walls do not stay upright, they fall in towards the middle making it even more closed it. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit for a long dog
customer_reviews.text: Seems like good quality. I went and bought a thicker insert because the two it comes with are pretty thin. My 6lb doxie fit but if she was any bigger I wouldn't put her in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great! Stitching is solid, fabric is thick and appears to be durable. Comes with two bottoms so when you are traveling, if one gets dirty you can switch the positions of the bottoms and have a clean one. I've not traveled with it yet but have left it on the floor for my cat to go in when he wants and get used to it. He seems to enjoy it - but not as much as the box it shipped in.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The carrier arrived without the shoulder strap so I emailed Pawfect Pets via Amazon. I had a response from them in less than 10 minutes and a shoulder strap arrived in the mail within two days. That is awesome customer service! The carrier itself is roomy and seems to be very well made. I'm looking forward to using the carrier to take our little 8 lb. dog on an airline flight in the near future. I would definitely recommend ordering from Pawfect Pets!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Cozy as can be for my 2 kittens!
customer_reviews.text: My son was delivering our 2 new 4 month old kittens over Christmas via Southwest Airlines and he used this carrier -- very sturdy, fit perfectly under his airline seat, great viewing for the kitties inside, and easy for carrying over your shoulder with the shoulder strap which was included. Just used it again for transporting kitties to the vet this past week and I love being able to see in and know just how they are doing! I would highly recommend this carrier for either airline travel with your pets or for everyday use!
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: So many extras on this wonderfully designed PawPerfect Pet carrier
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on as many sites as I could find before coming to Amazonsmile to buy two of these carriers. I’m thrilled! Now no more hard-sided carriers. There are too many good features to mention but you can see the photos and read their summary. They’re just great and are so easy to handle as I’m only 5 foot and carry both at the same time without really needing the shoulder straps. My cats are secure. I chose the PawPerfect Pets ones because they are just better than the rest. You’ll never be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Choose a different pet carrier !
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the return window closed two days before we needed this carrier. We were so excited to pick up or new puppy and fly with him back home !! This carrier let us down from the get go ! There is only one exterior pocket and the zipper separated the first time we used it so we were unable to store our valuables. The other zippers were very fiddly and unhandy to use as well. The material was stiff and this made it hard to get the zippers to work right. It did fit under the seat well. But that’s about all I can say “ good “ about it. I wish we could get our $35 dollars back !!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small pets
customer_reviews.text: I have a Yorkie and Chihuahua they both fit wonderfully in their bags and had more than enough room. They were able to see, move, turn, and stand up comfortably. They’re both small and weigh 8 pounds so they’ll be able to fly under our seats when we fly commercial. I read the reviews and saw how many great responses this bag received and was pleased once their bags arrived and even more when they were comfortable and didn’t pay and arm & leg like my friends did. If you’re undecided definitely try this one out worse case you can return it.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is quite small. It had such a VILE strong chemical smell that I would never consider putting my dog in it. I was leaving for a flight and so I returned it rather than try to air it out. The material was cheap looking and it seemed like it would be hot.
customer_reviews.author: Boot addict

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you enough how much I LOVE this carrier. I do not fly but my sweet Rose (Morkie weighing 3 pounds) goes everywhere with us now. The extra padding helps since she is just a puppy. It has several areas we can reach in to pet her and a small pocket on the side to store her dog poop bags and food container. I do put a cooling pad in there because we are located in south Mississippi and it gets really HOT. I truly recommend this for any family that wants to take their sweet fur baby with them anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: LDBrown

customer_reviews.title: I loved it. It's light but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So, this is more of an "in theory" review. I both misjudged my cat's size and the dimensions of the carrying case (I need remedial ruler lessons). When I opened the bag, I loved it. It's light but sturdy, stylish, and the padding inside is very plush - and you get two of the pads, which is great. Sadly, once SamSamIAm managed to wedge his whole big fluffy self into the bag, he couldn't quite get his tail tucked in and he looked miserable. On the positive side, he did try and squish himself in by his own volition. (Weird smell others mentioned was very very slight & would probably go away.)
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good carrier for small pets
customer_reviews.text: My two 1-year-old kitties sometimes have to go to the vet alone, so I purchased this as to avoid the huge hard carrier for them for quick trips. It works really well, but make sure you or the vet secure those zippers with the clip or they can be undone! One cat is very long and weighs about 8.5 pounds. The other is rather tiny for an adult and weighs 6 pounds. The carrier is collapsible for storage but I usually keep it out because they like using it as a bed. Sometimes together.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: A good carrier, but a little tall for under an airline seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality carrier and I appreciate that it comes with an additional cushion insert. However it definitely didn’t fit easily under a JetBlue seat—I had to squish it down, which displeased my cat greatly and wasn’t easy due to the structure of the carrier. I should have verified the measurements first to make sure it would fit, and I could tell right away upon opening that it would be an issue. It’s still a good carrier, just wouldn’t use it again on a plane.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn_Faerie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this travel carrier extremely classy, it's cozy on the inside for your cats. Both our new kitten and our 13 lb adult Siberian love it. There isn't a lot of room for the big guy to move around, but he doesn't want for it anyways. He doesn't put up a fight getting into this one the way he would with his big, hard side carrier. As soon as he's in he curls up. The pad at the bottom is soft and comfortable for them, the sides (while rigid enough to keep shape) are comfortable for him to be up against, and he can peek out in any direction because of all of the "mesh" siding.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We love these! I have one for my boy and when we got another kitten we grabbed one more. My cat is pretty large and he fits in there with plenty of room. The zippers clip together to stay secure, and overall its very sturdy, feels really well made and it comes with a couple different bottom inserts. I havent gone on any long trips with them, about an hour, but they fit on the seat or on the floor perfectly. Easy in and out for vet trips.
customer_reviews.author: Mel V

customer_reviews.title: This pet carrier was a great size and design ECEPT that when I picked up ...
customer_reviews.text: This pet carrier was a great size and design ECEPT that when I picked it up with my doggie in it with the shoulder strap, it flipped over! Yikes! When my hands were full at the airport, I really need something that I can set down and pick up with one hand. Unfortunately this didn't work. I had to return it. If they re-sign the shoulder strap to hook near the top or something, this would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MSD

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the quality and design of the carrier. Two separate zippers fell off the track the first time I tried each of them out. This was before I even tried to put my dog in the carrier. Also the shoulder strap seems to be attached too low on each end of the carrier causing the bag to feel top heavy and wobbly with my 7 lb dog inside. It flipped upside down easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great value and yorkie approved!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for the price. We have a 5lb yorkie and he fit in the bag with room to spare- we even placed his blanket and a toy in there with him and it all fit comfortably. I really like that the zippers clip together in case you have an escape artist. I also like all the different access points depending on where the bag is sitting it is very easy to always get to your bet. Plenty of ventilation. Nice pockets Definitely would recommend and would buy again if needed!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: She said her cat was very comfortable quiet during the flight
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my mom. When she flies, she takes her cat. She used it in Nov to fly to Florida. She said her cat was very comfortable and quiet during the flight. She has a 12 pound Siamese. The carrier is well constructed and the material used is first class. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Jillane

customer_reviews.title: Happy Chiweenie and owner
customer_reviews.text: I really love this carrier, and so does my 6 lb chiweenie, Sully. He fits perfectly with plenty of room to spin around. Keep in mind he is rather long, so this is great. I would say a 10 lb dog would be the absolute max. It is super cute and stylish. Seems to be easy to carry with the longer strap attached. It comes with an extra pad for the bottom, which is great in case one gets soiled. Sully has been carrying his toys in and out of it and snuggling on the pad. absolute great deal for the money and quality! Pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Hall

customer_reviews.title: Missing Shoulder Strap:  Update:  Problem Solved!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the small size for my little cat. There is not a lot of wiggle room, but it should okay for safe travel. The two plush mats are nice. The big disappointment is that there was no shoulder strap as indicated in the picture, but I see it was not mentioned in the description so my bad for not reading the fine print. Five stars for quality; 1 star for no strap shown in picture. Update: September 2, 2018: Pawfect Pets sent me an adjustable padded shoulder strap yesterday! It is 'purrfect!' I am changing my rating from 2 to 5 star for 'purrfect' product and customer service. Thank you Pawfect Pets!
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: Best Carrier!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this carrier. We used it last weekend with our 7lb Min Pin. He hates carriers and loves to bite, pull and scratch while inside. This carrier was great. So durable and he has a lot of areas to look out of. I love how it came with a comfy soft pad for inside and how there's also a leash attachment in case you need to secure your pet inside. I highly recommend this carrier. And it fits perfectly under the airplane seat. We flew United and had zero problem.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Fabric
customer_reviews.text: I used this product 1 time for an hour with our dog, he was able to chew multiple holes in it. I have had some carriers before and confused as to why this fabric was so flimsy. I'm super disappointed as this product seemed to have good reviews but I am going to have to spend double to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Em Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: As Described, but Could Be More Solid
customer_reviews.text: The hard board that goes in the bottom is vital to keeping its structure, so don't forget to put that in. Otherwise, the case *mostly* holds firm. It collapses a bit on top when you carry it, but that was to be expected since it's soft. Luckily, my cat is smaller so she was fine (10 lbs). And it, sadly, allowed me to smush the bag under the airline seat in front of me. Love the 2 fleece bottoms you can swap out. Plenty of zippers and small pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Baylea Sorto

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier! My little dog didn't want to go ...
customer_reviews.text: Great carrier! My little dog didn't want to go into another one I had, seemed afraid of it, so I bought this one. It is a light color on the inside with plenty of vents to see out all around, so it isn't a dark hole. She went right in and travelled in the car and on a 2.5 hour plane ride. It fit nicely under the seat in front of me, and when she got a little restless I put the carrier on my lap and put my hand in the small zippered window to comfort her. It is lightweight but the bottom stayed flat while I carried it. I can't think of a thing that needs improving!
customer_reviews.author: Valorie Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: If you need the shoulder strap, DONT BUY THIS BAG
customer_reviews.text: Cons: For whatever reason, the shoulder strap connects to the middle/bottom of the bag. So when we lifted it up, it immediately flipped entirely upside down, with our dog in it. She REALLY enjoyed that. The shoulder strap goes directly in front of the mesh in the front and back of the bag, so when I unzipped to let my dog poke out her head, she had to jam her head in the small spot to the left or right of the bag. It only has two small pockets (one mesh, one short but long). Pros: seems sturdy. Has a bed (and a replacement). That's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Zemetis

customer_reviews.title: get cat safely from NM to NY
customer_reviews.text: worked perfectly, secure, loved that the zippers could be latched to prevent accidental opening, cat could see out and was curious during the whole flight, fit under Southwest seat with no problem at all
customer_reviews.author: CegAbq

customer_reviews.title: Loose seam
customer_reviews.text: Loved the carrier as it was very easy to travel with for my 5 lb dog, however, after only 2 uses (the trip there and back), I found where the netting by the zipper on the top had already separated from the frame. My dog was very calm in the carrier so its not like she was scratching to get out. I am afraid to use again if the netting tear may get bigger. I bought the carrier several months before I needed it so I don’t think I can return it.
customer_reviews.author: RST

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this for one vet visit but I will share that once opened, my cat went right in and laid down bc the fleece liner is so inviting. Much better than a pet taxi with a blanket which is what I was using before. He loved that he could tuck his paws in a relax (before he realized he was at the vet lol). It’s stylish, easy to use, compact when not in use and comes with an extra fleece liner to switch out when you need to wash one. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great bag and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have an 11-pound mini schnauzer, seven months old. She has long legs so I feel like she could be on the verge of being a little too big but seems comfortable inside. The bag is well made and a fair price compared to the ones I saw in the pet store (and looks a lot nicer). We haven't gone on our trip yet, but the dimensions appear to fit in what SouthWest requires. I love that the pads are removesble and can be washed separate from the entire carrier. Also, I recived incredible customer service after my puppy decided to gnaw on the zipper while I wasn't looking right after I got the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Carried medium-sized cat (14 lbs) fine, fit under Southwest Airlines seat just fine
customer_reviews.text: Carried medium-sized cat (14 lbs) fine, fit under Southwest Airlines seat just fine. Has convenient pockets for storing cat treats, a "petting window" that allows access without allowing escape, and extra padding in case of soiling. Not much else to say, just wish it had an opening on the top so that you can "lift" a cat in more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence M

customer_reviews.title: Nice size. comes with two covered foam pads inserts ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes it. I put it on the floor open so she would get used to it. She likes to sit in it. So that will make it easier to get her into the carrier in future for trips to vet. Nice size. comes with two covered foam pads inserts so you can change out and wash as needed. Also a shoulder strap but I doubt I will use that. Handles are fine.
customer_reviews.author: NancyC

customer_reviews.title: Definitely runs small
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a nice, comfortable carrier for my cat but, even after measuring, it is too small for him to be comfortable in the carrier. My cat is an older chap, average size for a domestic shorthair and actually underweight. Even then, He can't sit up without his head touching the top. He can lay down just fine but if he wants to change positions or directions, it's a bit of a tight fit. I'm only using the carrier to transport him to and from the vet's office, so it's not terrible. If my cat needs a procedure or is really ill though, I don't think this carrier will be large enough to make the transport very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Wednesday

customer_reviews.title: Great pet tote!
customer_reviews.text: These totes are great! It was easy to load cats into the bags and they were durable even when one cat tried to claw her way out. There is a small zippered window so you can reach in to pet your animal which is really nice when they are scared. The zippered openings also have buckle latches so you can be sure they are secure. The side pouch is a perfect size to hold a leash.
customer_reviews.author: sscr

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy zipper.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to donate to a rescue who frequently has pups that are adopted by North Americans. The first pup put in it broke the zipper and was out almost immediately. In the future I would purchase a different brand, like the one I brought my pup home in! It has obviously been used a few times for transporting pups to their forever home by air.
customer_reviews.author: Mary f.

customer_reviews.title: Great pet carrier for a small dog!
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my Russian toy-terrier(similar to Chihuahua). She weighs less than 5 lbs. I got it to transport my dog from Europe(where I'm from) to America because I moved here. I had 3 flights, 20 hours total, and my dog is 9 years old. She handled the travel in the bag just fine. She didn't like to sit in it because she was anxious but she had enough room to stand. This pet carrier is made well, has a hard bottom and openings on four sides. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this pack. I bought this to bring my cat as carry on. I haven’t used it on the airplane yet- will do when the time comes. However, this thing is luxurious as far as carriers go. Super convenient entrance on the top and both ends. Two bedding pads that are super soft. Little pockets. A place to clip leashes so your cat can’t just run out and run away. My cat loves it so much she just naps in it- that says a lot because she normally HATES being in any type of carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Forscience

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, lots of strong screened ventilation.
customer_reviews.text: My pup is 11 lbs and a rescue who hates confined spaces. I put a treat inside along with her heating pad and she went in and got comfy with little hesitation. (I know I can't bring the heating pad on a flight but I just wanted to make her see it's a safe, comfy place). 4 hours later she's still snoozing. I haven't brought it on Southwest yet but I'm hopeful it fits as well as other reviewers say.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelophile

customer_reviews.title: Quality Carriers
customer_reviews.text: While I can't guarantee that my cats will *enjoy* their upcoming flight in these carriers, I do know that they'll be very comfortable. I bought one carrier for each of my cats - one is 9 lbs and the other is 12 lbs. There is plenty of room for both cats to stretch out - or curl up - for a 6 hour flight. These carriers are well made, stylish, and easy to carry. Small details like the contact info tag or the clasps to keep the zippers secure really made this carrier superior. Both bags also came with additional fleece pads -- awesome! Overall, I am incredibly pleased and can't wait to use these.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Okay carrier
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay carrier for a quick flight (3 hour flight). I bought this for my 12 pound shih tzu and she fit but wasnt very roomy. She is quite long for her breed so I figured it will be that way. We used JetBlue and it fit under seat perfectly. We flew from Florida to New York City and my dog really seemed to hate the carrier but ended up falling asleep after trying to get out. Be very careful using the strap it comes with! Very easy to flip your dog in the air when picking it up. Overall it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia

customer_reviews.title: Cute, right size and functional
customer_reviews.text: Held up well during travel. Fit my 8 lb chihuahua, however her head was a bit squished. I think that was mostly because she wouldn't lay down poor thing. No plane travel is comfortable however the puppy looked like it was as comfortable as she could be in a carrier under a seat. No issues with size and it has an accessible compartment on the top and side which was useful for feeding.
customer_reviews.author: Yans0809

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy straps allow you to hand carry or use shoulder
customer_reviews.text: Bought this carrier to transport my beloved 10# toy poodle from Cleveland, OH to Denver by air and back. Worked perfectly, dog could move, stand, and sit. Carrier fit under seat with no difficulty. Well made and looks stylish. The mesh sides and top allow dog to see out. Sturdy straps allow you to hand carry or use shoulder. Nice soft removable pad. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: jrj

customer_reviews.title: Easy use cat Carrier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this carrier to carry my cat from the barn to the house. He is a fairly large 14 pound cat and he barely fits in this carrier. He can turn around in it, but I would not want to use it to keep him in it for long periods of time. It is light and easy to carry. Its suits my purpose as it only adds a couple of pounds to the cat's weight and therefore is not too heavy. Being smaller it is easier to put in the car and carry up steps, but I would not recommend it for a cat this size for any length of time.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Carrier
customer_reviews.text: Love the carrier. My little Lulu (a Yorkei-Poo), is still “out” literally. I have been putting treats into the back of it and after much sniffing, scruffing her paws and going all around it she finally goes in, grabs the treat and backs right out. Fortunately we have until December 23rd for her to adjust. I have been putting her in the carrier and taking her for short walks. The carrier is very light weight and with the handle and shoulder strap it’s very easy to carry and she doesn’t seem to mind it. Would be nice if there were more pockets however I gave it 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a great product! Durable material, just right for our pug puppy. The 2nd pet mat is an added bonus - we use it for her to rest close to her carrier or wherever she needs the extra cushion. The size is just right too! We've tried other carriers but they were just too small and short for our little pup. The only thing I would change to this product if it ever gets redesigned is more storage pockets for doggie items. I purchased a collapsible doggie bowl to hook on to the side of the carrier, which should free up the side pockets for other things. But again, overall... GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like really carsick
customer_reviews.text: My cat gets carsick. Like really carsick. This thing is a lifesaver. We moved cross country and before we found a nasea medicine that worked for her she threw up in it multiple times. This thing is easy to clean. The extra pad gets you back in business faster. It’s comfortable. You’d think after a long road trip my cat would hate it. She still regularly uses it for naps in the house. Awesome product that fit our need perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Katz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small dogs! Budget Friendly!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I love this travel bag. We have a 5lb Maltipoo and this is perfect for him! Its super comfortable on your shoulder or when held by the hand strap. It's good quality material. Trust me it's good cause our maltipoo is teething and he can't rip the net on it. :) I love how the pad easily comes out and we just throw it in the wash. Super simple. Come in clutch! Order it now! Don't waste $70.00 at Petco....
customer_reviews.author: Sofian Sheikh

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My cats respond to these carriers MUCH better than the hard plastic ones. We used get completely traumatized when having to stuff our cat into the plastic carrier, because there was a lot of scratching and spraying. However, the cats don't mind this at all. The bottom pads are washable and come with a replacement. The cats feel very secure and comfortable. We have two cats, about 7lbs each.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha O.

customer_reviews.title: on top of the not-often-used but excellent carrier. )
customer_reviews.text: Work perfectly well for both big kitty and little kitten (separately!). Big kitty has decided that the extra mat that comes with this is his new special spot - we have it permanently placed on the kitchen table (gross, I know, but we do luv our kitty!), and he has not tired of it yet, after three months! (So the mat is a little everyday bonus, on top of the not-often-used but excellent carrier.)
customer_reviews.author: BofHope

customer_reviews.title: Finalya nice carry on to my beloved pets
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my dogs ( I have 2 yorkies tea cup size) Very easy to carry on, another great feature about this bag is the fact that your pets can have easy access to breath , this bag don’t block your pet vision with just one space to put their head , on this carry on your pet will be just as comfortable and able to see and breath without any problems. Easy to take with you anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mr 5 stars

customer_reviews.title: Zippers not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: The zippers on the sides come apart easily making for escaping animals. The actual zipper party tears open easily. This happened the first time we used it. Even putting both zippers down does not keep it from happening. I had to pay for boxing it up to send it back and am not happy about that either!
customer_reviews.author: John D Christensen

customer_reviews.title: outstanding
customer_reviews.text: this carrier was amazing. i have never seen my kitty so comfortable while be transported around cars, planes, etc. she really liked it. she isn't small, she fit it just right. had enough room to curl up, stand up and lay full spread. i did line the bottom with more padding as she likes to snuggle in. otherwise, this was an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ninjacb

customer_reviews.title: Bad zipper
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this over the summer for my trip in December 2019 so I didn’t get to use it really but maybe once or twice. when I did Put it to good use I realized one of the zippers does not zip correctly so since I am too late in asking for a return I’ll have to just deal with not using that side with the bad zipper. Besides that important function everything Else about the bag was great
customer_reviews.author: DAIVELISSE HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of mesh on top and sides for your fur baby to breath and see comfortably. Comes with extra pad
customer_reviews.text: Roomy and stylish carrier. I purchased this for my kitten, but would definitely be big enough for an adult size cat or small dog. The pockets are convenient as well as the shoulder strap. Plenty of mesh on top and sides for your fur baby to breath and see comfortably. Comes with extra pad, which is nice just in case you need to switch it out. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mai Ling Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Stylish but also convenient
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for traveling! I have a toy Yorkie and he loves his travel bag. It’s comfortable from what I have observed of my dog’s liking, it’s spacious for a dog 3lbs-5lbs and it comes with multiple compartments for dog treats, food, etc. it also comes with washable pee pads. I definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Taea Jhingoree

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this carrier for my pug puppy to take him to training classes. It is too difficult to drive and keep a puppy safe by holding him. The carrier is well made and sturdy. My puppy is 5 1/2 pounds right now and he fits perfectly. He can turn around and stand up. The carrier is a bit smaller than I expected but will hopefully work for a while longer. I love that the sherpa lining for the bottom is washable and that the carrier came with 2 sherpa liners. I have had to wash one already and it washed up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Smith

customer_reviews.title: Did fit onto Southwest airlines with no problems and no questions.  Just not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: The carrier was the right size for a 10 pound mini dachshund, however it is very tippy. Anytime the dog is not centered perfectly (never), the whole carrier tips over. ALSO, the dog can chew right through the mesh in just minutes if not watched very closely. The mesh is so soft that a dog can grab at it and pull it enough to be able to twist and chew. The shoulder carrier strap is not very well centered to the carrier and the whole carrier tilts while being carried on the shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: hc

customer_reviews.title: Durable, comfy, and airline-approved (Alaska Air)
customer_reviews.text: This bag is durable and comfortable for my adult cat. She's fairly small for an adult, just under 10 lbs. She has the space to move around and sit in different positions. This was our first plane trip and I was worried because she's usually distressed when riding in the car. However, with this carrier she slept most of the flight (Alaska Airlines)! Be careful side zipper where cats can poke out their head -- my cat can fit through and jump right out! Luckily, she did this at home, not on the flight. I highly recommend buying this long before your trip and allow your cat to mark it with their scent and get comfortable being inside it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Panchito looks and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Used by a 9lb male- skinny, conceited Chihuhua... he fits perfectly and has plenty of room to stretch. It can benefit of a more pluffy bottom tray.... maybe a small blanket can be folded for more cushion. It only fits under the airplane sit, if forced. But not impossible to manage. Traveled on Southwest. It is nice and Panchito looks very elegant inside his blue carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Lara

customer_reviews.title: Best bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought other carriers in the past that weren’t sturdy. Our dog is little and we’d get the biggest bag that was allowed on the airline, but they always seemed too small, squashed and skinny. This bag is the best! It may be an inch or so taller than some airlines permit, but it will fit under the seat on the plane and we’ve had no complaints from the airlines. Our dog even likes to sit in it when we’re not traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality zipper -zipper jammed the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor quality and cheaply made zipper - I order this carrier in a rush to compare with another one, and it basically arrived with the zipper broken. The size seemed okay, but you get what you pay for. The zipper jammed and misaligned as I was opening it the first time, so it was useless. The material seemed okay for a low-cost pet carrier which would be the only thing that merits a star. I was leaving the next day to fly domestically, and I'm only glad it didn't break as I was in the TSA line as that would have been a total disaster. I will try to return it if allowed.
customer_reviews.author: Mads

customer_reviews.title: Really a nice pet carrier!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carrier for my 6 pound Yorkie with plenty of room. I have to use the half door side to get him in as he can get away from me using the full door. He rides well and is easy to carry. I'm happy at how well the carrier is constructed. Mine shipped without the shoulder strap. I have to compliment customer service because the strap was sent quickly after just one quick email explaining my issue. Thsnks for such a fast response!
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Good for short use, small cats
customer_reviews.text: This carrying case would be ideal for smaller cats (length and weight) and is well constructed but I would not consider it heavy duty. I ended up giving it to a friend with a kitten and that was perfect. For my long, 10lb cat I felt bad cramming her in and got a better fitting and stable case.
customer_reviews.author: m5441500

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well-constructed pet carrier.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well constructed, substantial carrier. I am more than pleased with the quality and ease of access! It is the perfect size for cats and small dogs. It comes with two nice quality fleece, removable liners and plenty of mesh windows so a pet will have lots of fresh air and be able to see and be seen. The mesh openings come with heavy-duty zippers, with safety locks. There is an exterior zip pocket and name tag. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Merrivale

customer_reviews.title: This is a good pet carrier!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good pet carrier. The carrier is sturdy and the top stays up and doesn't cave in. I took my pet on a plane and I didn't have any problems at all. It comes with 2 floor cushions that stays in place with velcro. You can put the 2nd pad in your carry on in case your pets goes to the bathroom and change it out. It also fit perfect under the airline seat. The zippers have an escape proof lock on them. I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: partcentpc

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality product. The pictures are accurate. The zipper is a good quality, and it's nice that it comes with two inserts. We picked up our kitten from approximately 3 hours away from our house, and he needed to go to the bathroom. He wet inside the tote, and I was easily able to change out the insert to the second one provided. When I got home, I washed the first one and it's good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Bought new but received a used carrier UPDATE: A beautiful carrier.
customer_reviews.text: I received my carrier and it was used. There was dog hair all over and a dog's nail was in there. Im sooo grossed out. UPDATE: I want to apologize to owner of PAWFECT PETS. Thank you for making this right. This was Amazons fault due to someone returning a used carrier and Amazon not reviewing the product and recycling it to a new owner. Irregardless to what Amazon did, the carrier is beautiful and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Jerman

customer_reviews.title: Not for cats since lacks top loading
customer_reviews.text: Returned this because I realized I needed a top loading option for a cat. Otherwise though it was really nice. Tasteful color choices and materials. The top sinks down but it's also easy to bend in if putting under an airplane seat, so it's okay. Liked that the siding had a little bit of padding, which would make no difference to the animals but did make a difference to the appearance of the bag, as it keeps it looking unwrinkled. Ended up getting the Mr.Peanuts bag, which isn't as nice looking, but has that single necessary feature for cats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier/ Add Brighter colors
customer_reviews.text: Very nice carrier for my pups. My Two Chis loves it. Because of the mesh fabrics all around they can see you from every angle. Also like the option to load them on top and on the sides. Love, love the little zipper window in front. I keep it open while traveling in the car and when at the stores. I can touch them so they feel secure. Also give them treats. The 2 mats are a plus. The only thing I will add would be more girly girl bright colors Animal print in black and white AND brown and black. A little "bling" on the fabrics will not hurt
customer_reviews.author: Mumsi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and perfect for transporting our bearded dragon!
customer_reviews.text: This has been perfect for transporting our bearded dragon. It would also accommodate an x-small dog or cat just fine. There are plenty of pockets and I love that there is a quick release buckle that you can snap together to keep they two zippers from opening. The color is perfect and neutral gray print. The extra fluffy insert allows for washing convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Trista Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. I went from a large hard carrying case to this. My 7 lb cat fits great and she loves it. She hangs out inside it when I leave it out in our living room. Little does she know its her travel cases. PS It is a good looking carrying cases too, very fashionable.
customer_reviews.author: David F

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Fit great under the seat on an Alaska airlines flight. Very sturdy - no rips despite my cat’s best attempts to claw his way out. The small extra storage pockets on the side were a nice touch to store his treats and medicine. My cat is long and big but he fit with plenty of room to turn around. The padded insert was comfortable for him. And it’s super cute and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Nicollette Mead

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Travel Bay
customer_reviews.text: I used it to pick up my Whippet puppy from Knoxville TN. WORKED GREAT WITH NO HASSLES FROM AIRLINES. Pup got a free ride. The pup was 7 lbs when I used it. Now puppy is 33 lbs 6 months later. I either get another pup or give it away. Does the job nicely.
customer_reviews.author: S. Spinner

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return because before the first use one of the zippers broke. My cats are large at 12 and 15 lbs. They fit in carrier, but it was tight. The clips securing the zippers closed and small for my finger.
customer_reviews.author: C. McCully

customer_reviews.title: Dog hair in carrier
customer_reviews.text: When we opened the box there was black dog or cat hair in it someone must of returned it after putting there animal in it. My dog dosnt she’s. I ordered another one hopefully it wasn’t a prior return.. I like this one because it has a lot of windows ... nice size
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: the design is great. I love the fabric color
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the opportunity to usexperience this carrier yet, hopefully soon. With that being said, the design is great. I love the fabric color. I have it sitting in my house so my cat can get use to it before traveling in it. It seems very sturdy and we'll made. Once we use it I'll right another review.
customer_reviews.author: Love prim

customer_reviews.title: 13 lb guy fits & it's a great looking bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Unfortunately, my baby tore his ACL so we didn't get to fly with it BUT, the carrier does fit him with plenty of room to turn around in. My little guy is 13lbs. Although, I did notice that the bag does try to fold in at the center of the bag (due to shipping) but, can be easily fixed. 4 stars due to the fix.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: It was a beautiful l carrier
customer_reviews.text: It was a beautiful l carrier. .but I have flown many times with my dogs although it was stylish it lacked the top support to keep from collapsing if there were some We're some unseen event. If it were beefed up I'm the general support department I would have kept it. It it's just for car or around town transportation it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jbridge

customer_reviews.title: Straps Break very easily
customer_reviews.text: Took these from Baltimore to San Francisco to bring back 2 new puppies. The part on the shoulder straps that snaps onto the carrier broke immediately on BOTH carriers rendering them unusable as a shoulder carry. I ended up buying two straps at the airport luggage store. The carriers themselves are good quality and have an extra fleece base so that you can wash one while using the other.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua L. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Unsturdy and bad chemical smell!
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy at all. Aster using it for 5 weeks now, the carrier keeps falling in my puppy, it doesn't stand up anymore and my dog is only 5 lbs. Also it has this cheap chemical smell from the beginning which still didn't go away. The carrier looks pretty but it's not functional for more then a month.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi G. Bertucci

customer_reviews.title: A Little Small But Very Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is very durable andwell made. It is a bit small for our 12-lb cat but we will squish her in to comply with airline regulations.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Alkire

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Airline softsided Carrier for Kitties.
customer_reviews.text: Great Southwest Airlines approved soft pet carrier. I would recommend this to anyone. Beebs the kitty weighs 12 lbs and is a good 13 inches long. It was a great fit for him. You can be surprised how little they can become when they are scared and not used to a place. He was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: It is kinda sturdy however its really lacks in keeping its shape
customer_reviews.text: It is kinda sturdy however its really lacks in keeping its shape. My pup is a 7 pound maltese and when I would carry him with the shoulder strap the top parts which sort of cave in and the rest sort of billow down. I would also say that the pup only being able to enter by one side is not as convenient. I would have liked a zipper on the top side as well as well as some under the bag compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Fayad

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking & stiff
customer_reviews.text: Overall disappointed. It’s a decent carrier but looks quite cheap. The structure is kind of stiff and doesn’t bend/mold well, like it needs to under an airline seat. Perfectly functional but not what I was looking for. The side pocket is not zippered which makes it easy for things to fall out.
customer_reviews.author: lulubelle29

customer_reviews.title: It's funny the way he stands up and looks through the ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a carrier for transporting her bearded dragon to the vet. This is exactly what we were looking for and he loves it! It's funny the way he stands up and looks through the little windows so he can still see what's going on around him. We've only had it a few days, but it seems to be high quality and worth the money. Thanks for making such a great product for our little Charlie to enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: PixelPosy

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable from what I can tell and the cat doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes it. My wife likes it to carry the cat. It's comfortable from what I can tell and the cat doesn't get nervous. However, the only reason I gave it 3 stars as appose to 5 stars is because the border lining around the zipper area came bent due to the packaging. I thought after a while it would straighten out and stand up just like you see it on the pictures but it hasn't.
customer_reviews.author: John

product_meta.title: Pawfect Pets Airline Approved Pet Carrier Soft-Sided Cat Carrier and Dog Carrier for Small Dogs and Cats, Fits Underneath Airplane Seat. Comes with Two Fleece Pet Mats.
feature_bullets: ★ TUCK AIRLINE PET CARRIER UNDER SEAT to CREATE A COZY TRAVEL HOME for SMALL DOGS & CATS: 17.5"L x 10"W x 11"H is the BIGGEST SIZE ALLOWED by major airlines yet FITS PERFECTLY under your seat

★ APPROVED AIRLINE PET CARRIERS: ACCEPTED as a SOUTHWEST Airlines Pet Carrier, AMERICAN Airlines Pet Carrier, JETBLUE Pet Carrier, DELTA Pet Carrier Plus VIRGIN, ALASKA, FRONTIER, ALLEGIANT, UNITED & MORE

★ ULTRA-SAFE, EXTRA DURABLE – UPGRADED to REINFORCED Polyester & CLAW-DEFENSE MESH on top & 4 sides ensures your pet has ample VENTILATION and AIRFLOW & it WON’T TEAR like flimsy, cheap carriers while MINI BUCKLES ensure your pet stays tucked safely inside.

★ CUSTOMERS SAY IT’S SO CONVENIENT- 3 QUICK ACCESS OPENINGS – REMOVE YOUR PET FAST, DELIVER TREATS: Airport pet carrier that opens on both ends and the side and 2 EXTRA FLEECE PET MATS easily wash out by hand

★ YOUR PET FITS - OR THEY DON’T FLY - & WE’LL REFUND YOU 100%: As the creator of the LARGEST airline approved pet carriers we can say “IF YOUR PET DOESN’T FIT IN THIS, THEY CAN’T FLY UNDER YOUR SEAT.” So we encourage you to MEASURE YOUR PET BEFORE YOU BUY to SAVE YOURSELF TIME and if for any reason you get this home and you’re not satisfied, we’ll happily refund you 100%

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
